title: kaNa kaN kODi
sahitya:
kANa kaN kOTi vENDum karunAkara muruganaik



anupallavi



ANippon shrI subhramanyanai vegu kaNyanai



caraNam



kaDaliDaikkadir udayamAna ghana ughra cakravAkamAna aDal mayil mIdoLirum

guhanai anavarata chitsukhanai

maDamayil vaLLi kunjari maNavALanai shei vEl tanai dhrDha bhakta kavi

kunjaravara shIla dAsa dayALanai
